headline: Tell HN: Be careful when using Upwork for consulting work
description:
Hi HN,

I thought I would warn some of you that might be using Upwork for consulting/freelancing about the first issue with payment protection I came across (I have logged 3k hours on the platform and received a top-rated plus badge, whatever it means).

To me, the 5-20% fee Upwork was taking for projects was fair, given their hourly protection programme, where if you use their tracking app that logs screenshots, keyboard and mouse activity then your payment for work was guaranteed.

The app has a feature where it will not log time if your keyboard and mouse are not active enough, what I did not know up until yesterday is that even if the app logs the work Upwork can decide that the activity was not enough and they will reimburse the client at their discretion.

In case anyone is interested how the process looks in detail: you get two e-mails:

---

1st one:

Refund Notification

Hi Mateusz, You refunded $X to CLIENT_NAME.

2nd one:

Upwork Help: Reversal Notification: Upwork Hourly Payment Protection

We are writing to inform you that your client’s payment was unsuccessful for the week of March 21, 2022 - March 27, 2022. As such, we have reviewed your Work Diary and reversed hours logged that did not meet the criteria for Upwork’s Hourly Protection policy.

The following hours have been reversed back to your client:

Reason: Low Activity

Upwork will reverse time for the following when reviewing your Work Diary:

  * Manual time
  * Low activity
  * With insufficient or no work memos
  * With more than 10 minutes of activity not pertaining to the job itself
  * Activity that violates Upwork’s Terms of Service
Please note that the reversal will show up in your transaction history as a "Refund" even though the transaction was a reversal processed by Upwork. If your client approved the hours reported in your work diary, please ask them to make a bonus payment to you for the amount reversed.

To resolve this issue going forward, please use the Upwork Team app to track your time and make sure that your hours are logged according to the Upwork Hourly Protection guidelines: https://support.upwork.com/hc/en-us/articles/211062568-Upwork-Payment-Protection

---

As you can see, there will be no warning, so you will not have a chance to even get in touch with the client to start resolving the problem.

To sum up, if you do the work and the client has an issue with payment you can see part of your money disappear if you didn't use your mouse and keyboard, even though you were on a call with clients for multiple hours (documented by the screenshot) and you did not need to use your mouse and keyboard all that much because you are a consultant.

The cases when this will most likely hurt you are when the client has issues with payment or challenges your work.
headline_zh-Hans: 告诉HN：使用Upwork做咨询工作时要谨慎
headline_zh-Hant: 告訴HN：使用Upwork做諮詢工作時要謹慎
description_zh-Hans:
Hi HN,

我想我应该提醒一些可能正在使用Upwork进行咨询/再融资的人，我遇到的第一个关于付款保护的问题（我在该平台上记录了3千小时，并获得了一个顶级加分徽章，不管它意味着什么）。

对我来说，Upwork对项目收取5-20%的费用是公平的，因为他们的小时保护计划，如果你使用他们的跟踪应用程序，记录屏幕截图、键盘和鼠标活动，那么你的工作报酬是有保证的。

The app has a feature where it will not log time if your keyboard and mouse are not active enough, what I did not know up until yesterday is that even if the app logs the work Upwork can decide that the activity was not enough and they will reimburse the client at their discretion.

In case anyone is interested how the process looks in detail: you get two e-mails:

---

1st one:

Refund Notification

Hi Mateusz, You refunded $X to CLIENT_NAME.

2nd one:

Upwork Help: Reversal Notification: Upwork Hourly Payment Protection

We are writing to inform you that your client’s payment was unsuccessful for the week of March 21, 2022 - March 27, 2022. As such, we have reviewed your Work Diary and reversed hours logged that did not meet the criteria for Upwork’s Hourly Protection policy.

The following hours have been reversed back to your client:

Reason: Low Activity

Upwork will reverse time for the following when reviewing your Work Diary:

 * Manual time
  * Low activity
  *没有足够的工作备忘录或没有工作备忘录
  *有超过10分钟的与工作本身无关的活动
  * Activity that violates Upwork’s Terms of Service
请注意，尽管该交易是由Upwork处理的逆转，但逆转会在你的交易历史中显示为"Refund"。如果你的客户批准了你工作日记中报告的小时数，请要求他们向你支付被撤销的金额的奖金。

为了解决这个问题，今后请使用Upwork团队应用程序来跟踪你的时间，并确保你的时间是按照Upwork小时保护准则记录的：https://support.upwork.com/hc/en-us/articles/211062568-Upwork-Payment-Protection

---

如你所见，不会有警告，所以你甚至没有机会与客户联系，开始解决问题。

总之，如果你做了工作，而客户在付款方面有问题，你可以看到你的一部分钱消失了，如果你没有使用你的鼠标和键盘，即使你在与客户通话的多个小时里（由截图记录），你不需要使用你的鼠标和键盘那么多，因为你是一个顾问。

这最有可能伤害你的情况是，客户在付款方面有问题或挑战你的工作。
